original_text: Early in the morning, Jesus was standing on the shore of the lake. But the disciples did not know that it was Jesus who stood there.
korean_text: 날이 새어갈 때에 예수께서 바닷가에 서셨으나 제자들이 예수이신 줄 알지 못하는지라

sentences.original_text: Jesus was standing on the shore of the lake
But the disciples did not know
that it was Jesus who stood there
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에 서 계신 분이 예수님이라는 것을
